name: communications-manager
description: Public facing API for the Communications Manager service

scripts.publish: mkdir -p build && redocly bundle specification/communications-manager.yaml --dereferenced --remove-unused-components --ext json | poetry run python scripts/set_version.py > build/communications-manager.json
scripts.integration-postman-collection: poetry run python scripts/build_postman_environment.py && newman run postman/CommunicationsManager.Integration.postman_collection.json -e postman/Integration.test.postman_environment.json

author: NHS Digital
